column5: With the last 3 or 4 days of very cold weather I was wondering if there is any walkable ice yet? Im just going stir crazy..would love to do some perchin..
I burst out laughing when I saw the title. There may be no fishing at all this winter on LPB
thats brutal..oh well wishfull thinking I supose....Im glad I was good for a laugh there Dan...
Zero ice anywhere, was down at 9th line this morning, what a joke.   We won't be out until Feb if we are lucky.
There is ice on Puslinch lake an little lake,  people are out on it ice fishing
Dan, I thought the OP was asking about Simcoe, lol!  Yeah there's other ice up here to fish..  But I got the itch for lakers and whities!
It was for Long Point Bay and I mean Little Lake beside Puslinch lake
I figured that out after you replied   I might have a case of winter fever.
Pour "something" over ice cubes and YOU will be cured! If you fall what you'll hit all be warm and dry!
I've got some Gibsons Finest Rare 18 year on top of the fridge, that might just be the cure

I never touch the "hard stuff" but I do collect it. My oldest is a 64 Crown Royal and a Kings Ransom that was 12 years old when my daughter was born and that was in 77. Now that's warm.  Be careful out there, I was the same, not worth your life. Memories of ninth line.
